SEARCH

Uses of Package
org.hibernate.query.specification

Packages that use org.hibernate.query.specification
Package
Description
org.hibernate.query.specification
Support for SelectionSpecification and MutationSpecification which is similar in concept to criteria queries, but focused on ease-of-use and less verbosity.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.query.specification used by org.hibernate.query.specification
    Class
    Description
    DeleteSpecification
    Specialization of MutationSpecification for programmatic customization of delete queries.
    MutationSpecification
    Specialization of QuerySpecification for programmatic customization of mutation queries.
    MutationSpecification.Augmentation
    A function capable of modifying or augmenting a criteria query.
    ProjectionSpecification
    Allows a SelectionSpecification to be augmented with the specification of a projection list.
    ProjectionSpecification.Element
    Allows typesafe access to elements of the Object[] arrays returned by the query.
    QuerySpecification
    Commonality for all query specifications which allow iterative, programmatic building of a query.
    SelectionSpecification
    Specialization of QuerySpecification for programmatic customization of selection queries with ordering and restriction criteria.
    SelectionSpecification.Augmentation
    A function capable of modifying or augmenting a criteria query.
    SimpleProjectionSpecification
    Allows a SelectionSpecification to be augmented with the specification of a single projected attribute or path.
    UpdateSpecification
    Specialization of MutationSpecification for programmatic customization of update queries.
